column4: hi, i am looking for some help with my 9.10 upgrade.  grub-pc would not install, the initrd does not contain proper scripts for cryptsetup, and the grub-cfg is always written incorrectly. can someone help?
This helped me and I hope it helps you with your grub issues https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Grub2
does anyone here have experience with 10.04 upgrade, dm-crypt, lvm and problems with grub2?
i have read that and reread that. it does not contain specific enough information to be of any value
